## FormState type

[useFormStateAndFocusManagement](./react-dom-utils.useformstateandfocusmanagement.md) state

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type FormState = {
    errorMessages: Array<string>;
    type: "hasErrorMessages";
} | {
    type: "isNotSubmitted";
} | {
    type: "isSubmitted";
} | {
    type: "isSubmitting";
};
```
